itunes:title: Episode 564 - DB Sports Companion Show 03/17/20 - Tom Brady Is GONE!
title: Episode 564 - DB Sports Companion Show 03/17/20 - Tom Brady Is GONE!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Tom Brady leaving New England, the Texans trading Deandre Hopkins for David Johnson, the Khabib vs Ferguson UFC fight getting cancelled, the Kentucky Derby being postponed, Ross' conspiracy theory about half the NF...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Tom Brady leaving New England, the Texans trading Deandre Hopkins for David Johnson, the Khabib vs Ferguson UFC fight getting cancelled, the Kentucky Derby being postponed, Ross' conspiracy theory about half the NFL owners betting the season will be shortened or cancelled, and chat with our two favorite ticket brokers about how they might go under if these events actually aren't rescheduled.
